website_summaries.verdict: With a clear, fog-free view and excellent overall fit, this full-face snorkel mask brings the fun back to snorkeling.
pros: Rounded design offers a distortion-free view
Adjusts easily and fits the face well with little to no leaking
cons: Water can trickle in when completely submerged, particularly at the lower part of the mask
As with many full-face snorkel masks, breathing feels restricted and difficult

customer_reviews.title: Best snorkel mask!
customer_reviews.text: This snorkel mask is great! High quality for the price and super comfortable. I bought this on a whim, right before leaving for a family vacation in Florida. I'm glad I did! I have snorkeled all over the Caribbean while on cruises, and they always give you just the goggles and a seperate snorkel. This thing is a game changer, so much easier to use! I like the fact that it breaks down for easy transport in the mesh bag thats included. The go pro mount made it possible to get some awesome pictures and video as well! You wont be disappointed with this mask!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T.

customer_reviews.title: Great wide view and non-swimmers should find it confortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask for my upcoming snorkeling trip in key West. I tried it out in the pool couple days back. At first it felt weird to have the whole face covered compared to the regular snorkeling mask, but after swimming a bit I got used to it. It definitely has a nice wide view maybe even better (since this mask is brand new) than my old snorkeling mask. I think I will give this mask to mom or cousin who are not very good swimmers. I think it will make them more comfortable in the water because it is more user friendly for non-swimmers. Overall, I think the quality of the mask is good and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Aiste

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old son. We have an upcoming trip to the beach and snorkeling is at the top of our list to do! He was so excited when he got the mask that he had to go swimming with it. The mask fits as expected, so far hasn't fogged up and doesn't leak. I can not wait for our trip; I'm ordering one for myself now!
customer_reviews.author: TwinA

customer_reviews.title: Great face mask
customer_reviews.text: The face mask arrived on time, was packaged nicely and even came with a bag to carry it in. I tried it out at the YMCA pool to make sure the suction is good and was comfortable to wear prior to taking it on my upcoming cruise to the Caribbean. It passed all my tests. I cant wait to take it on vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Much better available from other sellers.
customer_reviews.text: Leaked like crazy and fogged up a ton! We used it at the beach first so my son could get used to it, and tried to adjust the straps, assure he had in on correctly. He ended up using traditional snorkel gear. Unfortunately I waited 2 days to long to try to return. Thankful I’m only out $27. Update ~ *after saying they refunded my money (because they read my review) I attempted to update this review & it wouldn’t- they emailed me incessantly. I asked them to stop, they didn’t. Most recent email 7/9/19 So over this company. I haven’t seen the refund yet- and the mask didn’t work. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Just Browsing

customer_reviews.title: Seals great and very comfortable...
customer_reviews.text: The mask seals great and has a very comfortable feel. It is easy to adjust the straps and the big viewing area is great for seeing underwater. The snorkel seals up when underwater and was able to easily breathe once I came up from underwater. The attachment of an action camera for use while swimming is easy and love the positioning of it directly above the mask so that it sees more what I see and easy to adjust. The snorkel is easy to attach and detach making it compact for travel
customer_reviews.author: Leips63

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and keeps water out!
customer_reviews.text: If you live snorkeling you will love this! No weird mask fitting - the straps adjust easily, are comfortable and keep the water out. When I dive down, the top of the snorkel keeps the water out. Best part? It totally scared my kids ;) hahaha! My friend tried it out and really liked it too so he is going to order one too. I wish this was around when I lived in hawaii!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Mel

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concept; however, the instructions are inadequate. I had chest pains after using this mask for only 4-6 minutes. I will return to a regular snorkel and mask in order to have adequate air flow.
customer_reviews.author: Carla M.

customer_reviews.title: Please Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This snorkel is not safe, please do not purchase. My husband and I brought these snorkels to our honeymoon in Maui (November 2019). We used them for 10 minutes before we quickly started to feel light headed and unsafe. We went back to the beach and decided to go rent traditional snorkel mask and googles. We later researched that the full faced snorkel mask are actually banned from the entire Maui island. And there has been over 15 deaths of tourists in the last 3 years from the use of these mask. The full faced mask do not allow the proper circulation of air.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great snorkel mask!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 4 Greatever snorkel masks for a cruise we were taking our kids on in the Caribbean. So glad we did! These masks fit just right - they were snug but comfortable (as much as you can be with a mask over you face lol), easy to adjust, and sealed well. My husband definitely liked them the most - we couldn't get him out of the water! The view using these masks was perfect. You just have to remember to breathe nice and slowly. They were also easy to pack in our suitcases. I've been telling everyone about these masks and how cool they are! Super happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color and used mask with sand and oil stains received!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these on the same day for my 2 kids only to receive 1 new (the turquoise color) and the red (which is NOT red) for my son bc it’s his favorite color that was actually a used mask with sand and what appears to be suntan oil stains all throughout. It is a dark magenta color and not red. Total disaster. Had this delivered to our vacation home for the long holiday weekend and now he does not have a mask. Very unhappy and will likely return BOTH masks and purchase new ones from another vendor.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: The death mask
customer_reviews.text: I called this the death mask because I literally felt like I was going to die and suffocate. I was really looking forward to using this mask for my trip to Belize when my friend and I went snorkeling. I thought it would have been great to not have to think about the mouth piece or water going in the breathing hole or tube. It came with a trade because I felt like I wasn’t getting enough air and it really ruined my snorkeling experience in the Caribbean Sea. I would not recommend to buy this mask!
customer_reviews.author: Zak Timko

customer_reviews.title: Best snorkel mask out there
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I picked up 2 of these to use in Mexico for snorkeling. I hadn't gone since I was a kid, and renting masks was just out of the question for me. These are easily adjustable and fit the face nicely. We followed the measuring chart and the masks were a perfect fit. We never had any water leak in, and I was able to stay in the water to snorkel for a few hours at a time without any problems. Would highly recommend using these if you plan on doing any kind of snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a narrow faced person properly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and we have not been able to adjust it to her face in order to avoid water from getting in. Mine fits perfect and I am able to see everything so clearly. My wife has a narrow face and mine is much rounded.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Leaks during flip turns.
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a replacement twice because it keeps leaking. I'll try one more time with a smaller size to see if that fixes the issue. However, the service reps were diligent in reaching out to see how to fix the matter. But by then I tried ac mask form another company... Same issues btw.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Can't breathe!
customer_reviews.text: I took this mask to snorkeling in Hawaii. The water did not seep in, nor did it fog up. However, it is quite difficult to breathe through the airhole. I'm not sure if my mask was defective or not. I do know that when taking big gasp of air, it was almost like breathing through a Mcdonalds straw (wide ones). After a few more attempts, I gave up and purchased a snorkel set from a local store for the remainder of my vacation.
customer_reviews.author: E.M.

customer_reviews.title: Nasty.  Got an OBVIOUSLY used product
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this a zero I would. Maybe it is a good product BUT what we received from Amazon had clearly been used. We opened the box to see hand prints and SAND inside the mask. HORRIBLE. Just a massive, gross, disgusting disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Great field of view and keeps water out
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this snorkel mask instead of a regular snorkel and mask. It is strange to use a regular snorkel and mask, breathing through my mouth without using my nose at all. This Snorkel mask though allows me to breath normally plus it covers my whole face and gives a nice, wide panoramic view. If I submerge too deep into the water it will stop the water from going into my mask too. It is well made and keeps a nice watertight seal on my face. All around great buy and would suggest it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Update: after second use the inner seal that prevents digging failed. Don’t waste your money!! Not a bad mask by any means. Actually quite superior to many snorkel setups. The only draw back is that if for whatever reason you tilt your head to far backwards...the air tube is cut off. Actually hard to do with regular use...but possible.
customer_reviews.author: wayne bush

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy- huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: We had a very bad experience with these snorkel masks. We ordered these masks to take with us to Hawaii and were excited to use them on several planned snorkeling excursions. They constantly fogged up during use, even after conditioning them with spray to help. They were extremely uncomfortable cutting into the sides of our faces. It was so bad we ended up renting equipment and abandoning using these masks and the fins we brought with us. We would not recommend this set to anyone. We followed all of the instructions sent on how to use. It was so frustrating!! Do not buy these. We are going back to basics and using separate masks and mouth pieces.
customer_reviews.author: RCollins

customer_reviews.title: Better than a traditional snorkel set
customer_reviews.text: A friend had a few of these for him and his kids on our last group trip. I had considered them once but figured they were a fluke. He said they work well, and since my son said he wanted one I purchased a couple. Generally, it is hugely better than the traditional set and the fogging is isolated to the breathing area, meaning you can always see. The fit was a bit uncomfortable and you may experience a little water seeping in, but again, better than the traditional (which did all these things much worse). Viewability is fantastic. I recommend this but try the sizes to get the comfort you need.
customer_reviews.author: BMW Fan

customer_reviews.title: Way more fun than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's birthday after he used one on a weekend trip with his grandparents and absolutely loved it. This is not the snorkel from my childhood... It blocks water from coming in if you go under, and lets you breathe in and out without water coming in when you're above water level. It came well packaged and comes with a bag to carry in. Looks great... Haven't been able to test this one out yet, but it is the same brand as the one his grandpa had and that one worked great. I can't wait for him to open it... He'll be so excited!
customer_reviews.author: Bloomy

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have gotten this last year when I wanted to.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really awesome. It fits snugly. almost no water leaks in, but if it does it blows right out through the valves. I am really happy with the way it fits. The only thing that is different is your mouth is covered so you feel like you can breathe in unlike a traditional snorkel. It was also difficult to learn to clear my ears when I drove deep. I'm used to plugging my nose and blowing out, but with this one you have to use the pressure of the mask on your face to kind of plug your nose and then blow out. It's very doable just was different.
customer_reviews.author: n.oneya

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertized
customer_reviews.text: I thought I might be expecting too much from these, but they really do let you breathe pretty much normally with your face under water. It's a little restrictive, but you can breathe through your nose, which I like. I bought these for my kids, thinking that I wouldn't be able to use them with a full beard, but that turned out to be no problem at all. I've never snorkeled before, so it was a little shocking to see so much at first. I got a feeling of vertigo seeing the bottom of the lake so far below me. I'd recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Harder

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask!
customer_reviews.text: I really like how easy this was to clean and not to worry about water getting inside the mask. It’s a great snorkeling mask especially when you mount the GoPro on it. I really love that part. However, I think this mask works a little bit too well because there are times where I did find it very hard to breathe in and I would have to quickly take it off to get a good breath of fresh air. But definitely worth buying than the other masks.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works as described and enjoyable, but view how-to's on using a full face snorkel mask
customer_reviews.text: The Greatever G2 is a very good snorkel mask. We purchased 3 of them for my 2 children and my wife. All enjoyed and used the mask in the Gulf on a week trip there. Nobody had issues snorkeling with the mask and they seemed to control the air pretty well. The area around your mouth would fog up but the panoramic area around your eyes would stay clear. This is as designed because of how the air flows through the mask. BUT, I would watch videos and reviews on using full face snorkeling masks before you buy one. They are only for rec snorkeling and only for casual swimming. No free diving or exercise.
customer_reviews.author: N. Haller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use compared to the old school snorkeling equipment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my boyfriend as I have one of these already. Needless to say he loves it. When we usually go on vacation and go snorkeling we typically end up renting their equipment and it’s usually the old school ones that they have. This is easy to use as all you need to do is put it on and breathe normal rather than the other one you had to breathe through your mouth into the tube so that you don’t intake water. It also has an attachment for you to add your gopro in to it so you can record without holding on to the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Zeba

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!! Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to take with us on our 2 week vacation to the lake in the sierras. I ordered it early because I have a large head and I wasn't sure if it was going to fit. It shipped quick and came in a great carry bag. It fit great, no leaks, clear view and comfortable! I was able to snorkel for a long time with out any issues. The straps allow you to adjust the fit so even my oldest son was able to utilize it. There is a an attachment for the go pro, I haven't used this yet but plan to on my next adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Perez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic snorkeling mask!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, no pinching or suctioning on the face, just a smooth cushion fit. Easy detachable clip on both sides with a soft strap so you don't catch your hair. Breathing was nearly normal, just remember not to panic, breathe a little slower. Zero fogging, without the spit spray. No water got in this mask, not when I slid into the water and went under or when waves went over me. This package comes with an attachment screw for a go pro type camera. It fit my tiny diving camera perfectly. This also came with ear plugs and a nose plug. There's a mesh carry bag with handle and velcro closure. Definitely recommend this mask!
customer_reviews.author: Tara White

customer_reviews.title: Best snorkel mask
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. You breath in and out of your mouth which is different from a regular snorkel mask so it takes a little to get used to. I’ve used it twice so far and each time it had never fogged up. It’s so clear and you have this 180 degree view. It has clips on the side for quick detachment. I have a beard so it leaks a little but that’s for all masks. However when it does leak it doesn’t go up my nose. It’s comfortable to wear. The go pro attachment is fantastic. I will be purchasing one for my wife so we can use on our upcoming vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid LOVES the mask
customer_reviews.text: My kids had been seeing several other kids at the lake with these and really wanted them. There's lots of variations out there and I had trouble settling on one, but I went with this one for my slightly-taller-than-average 6yo and it works great for her. She has lots of very unruly hair and she still easily gets a good seal using the adjustment straps. I used the sizing chart in the picture and got her the small. She measured just at 4in and this fits her well with room to grow. Any smaller though and i'd probably look at the kid-specific versions.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby C

customer_reviews.title: Used for covid-19 protections reduces the chance of the virus entering through your face
customer_reviews.text: at the outbreak of covid-19 I purchased this for a friend of mine who was a retired doctor for a full face covering and a mask to use when he goes out in public because like my self he is in a high-risk group. we got them to use at the beach or only four blocks from the beach but with the virus reusing them right now off-label we've pulled the snorkel out of the top packed in a piece of mask and it's super good at keeping your eyes and nose from getting any trace of virus when you're in an area where you're concerned of.
customer_reviews.author: michael g California Kid

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This mask far exceeded my expectations. I was able to snorkel for over 1 hour without lifting my head or removing the mask. I was snorkeling in 2-3 foot waves in salt water and never tasted salt. Everytime a wave took me deeper the float ball check worked perfectly to prevent water entering. The view and performance were excellent. While researching the mask I took note of a few complaints about inhibited air intake. I did not experience that at all. I did find that breathing through my mouth caused some fatigue in my jaw. Upon further experimentation I discovered that if I only breathed through my nose this problem went away altogether. I highly recommend this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Full Face Mask
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mask for my husband before our last Caribbean cruise, because he has trouble with the traditional type of goggles and snorkel. This mask covers your eyes, nose, and mouth all at once. You don't have to worry about holding the snorkel in your mouth or having it pop off your mask when making adjustments. The mask appears to be well-made with quality materials, unlike a cheaper version we had bought a few years ago, and is much easier to put on and take off than the traditional type of mask and snorkel.
customer_reviews.author: RebekahJP

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, cool design!
customer_reviews.text: I got another mask but my husband wanted an all black one. He saw this and he insisted on me buying this one! Lol. He said he loves the design and he is excited for our snorkel trip. I asked him if the elastic was too tight and he said it was fine, it didn’t bother him. It is smart to always measure the bridge of your nose to your chin to make sure you get the right size! We got L-XL and it fits perfect! My husband said that the plastic is also very clear and he can breathe well.
customer_reviews.author: C Hdz

customer_reviews.title: well worth the price, quality made
customer_reviews.text: we went on a cruise to the southern Caribbean and from past experience we didn't like the cheep equipment on any of the snorkeling excursions. So we picked your full face mask. after reading the positive reviews we took a chance..and it paid off..we had a fabulous time and snorkeled three different islands and even with the stingrays. the only request my wife had on our last cruise was to upgrade the snorkel equipment. so this time we did..very good product.
customer_reviews.author: jack b

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This mask was so useful for us when we snorkel in the Maldives. We were out in the water for long periods of time and the mask suction was lasting the entire time. The only thing I would say about this mask is if the cushion we're softer it Would've been more comfortable if you plan to we're it for hours a day. All together, this was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Henny Boy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Masks for surface snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: These snorkel masks are really pretty awesome. Purchased two of them for a trip to Hawaii a few months ago. Used them quite a bit and really enjoyed them. Once you get them fitted, the attachment points really make putting them on and taking them off is really easy. Being able to breathe through your mouth OR nose is really wonderful and they worked really well for both of us. We recommend them highly if you don't go deep (you can't grab your nose to equalize inner-ear pressure).
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Starts great but leaks and quickly becomes uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: We are an avid snorkeling family. We had previously purchased a full face mask in Spain and everyone loved it so decided to purchase two more in two different sizes - one for a kid, one for an adult. This mask looks nice but leaked early and easily despite being the proper sizing. The other issue with the mask was how painful it became 10/15 minutes into a snorkel - immense pressure on the cheek area. Since we have used a full-face mask before without issue, we know the problem is with this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Sully2017

customer_reviews.title: Is just okay
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this mask. My husband and I each got one for a recent trip to Maui. Sometimes it would seal all around, but sometimes it was very difficult to adjust. The biggest reason we are going back to the regular snorkel is that you can't communicate on the water easily as you can with just a plain snorkel. You have to take the whole mask off and then re-adjust it etc.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Easy and comfortable snorkel mask.
customer_reviews.text: Like: easy to put on and comfortable on the face. The netting bag that came with of makes it convenient to carry it around and not worry about scratching the mask. Dislike: I used it to swim laps at the pool and the air in the mask did get a-bit warm and less fresh when I breath harder with the exercise and felt I needed to slow down. I never use mount-piece type of snorkel gear before, so I do not know if this is normal for snorkeling gear. I am planning to use it in Hawaii and this mask is easy to use and will be sufficient for me at the hotel beach front for casual snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy it!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and seems sturdier than others I’ve used! The weakness of the others I’ve used was the connections for the straps that hold the mask in place on your head weren’t secure or would break! Has an anti-fog system that keeps the condensation from expelled breath localized around your mouth and not your eyes which works well! Also a plus that the breathing tube disconnects for travel and comes with an extra gasket. Haven’t used the camera mount but seems like a good idea and worth a try. Overall very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: "Google it!"

customer_reviews.title: Great for swimming laps
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my old swim mask and decided to go for a more expensive model with a high rating. And it was worth it. I use this for swimming laps. Much more easy to breathe than my old swim mask; and the spout is longer, so less issues getting it placed underwater. My only issue is that when I swim the american crawl; I hear a whistle when I breathe in; it doesn't happen when I do the breast stroke, so it may be the positioning. Even so, I like this one much better.
customer_reviews.author: Raylan

customer_reviews.title: Where was this snorkel when we were in hawaii?!
customer_reviews.text: Best mask ever! If you want easy and comfortable snorkeling - this is the mask for you. The face mask gives you uninterrupted views and the no-bite breathing style means you can snorkel for hours without having a sore jaw afterwards. It folds pretty compact so traveling with it will be easy... it even comes with a little mesh bag so sand doesn't get caught in it. Can't wait to use this on vacation the year. We also use this mask when we are power washing super messy things (things that cause a lot of spray-back) - weird use - but works like a charm - no more eating gross water.
customer_reviews.author: patterbean

customer_reviews.title: The colors are great. Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: The color is great. Daughter loves it. The mask has duel purge valves on the snorkel and one by your mouth. This is the older version where the snorkel slides into the top of the mask and locks with a twist. Don't know if the is better or worse than the 2020 version (which has a hinged snorkel). Seals well. Only thing that could be a fault is the head strap but, it is the same as the new one so going up a model year has no real benefit. Go for what you like is my advise.
customer_reviews.author: Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: Best snorkel mask
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this snorkel mask that I purchased for my 10 years old daughter. She used it during our family trip, it was easy to put on and she said no water leak inside the mask. It did not fog up while she was snorkeling and she saw everything clearly but of course she made sure not to submerge the top into the water. She used it for 1hr+ and she felt fine. It is easy to set up and take with you on trip, great for adult and kids. Easy to rinse and air dry. I would definitely recommend this item to family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Roman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and secure.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during covid. I am a health care provider and in preparation for doing procedures on patients, thought this might be a better way to protect myself. I got a cpap filter (99.9% effective vs 95% for N95 mask), then 3D printed a female to female connector and put it on the snorkel. I felt safer. And the added benefit, I’ll be able to use this snorkeling when the pandemic is over! Disclaimer: (haven’t used in water yet). But very comfortable, great visualization, great air flow and doesn’t fog up.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous mask to play in the sand!
customer_reviews.text: This is the snorkel of every mans dreams! My sexy husband Ron Ron and I take our Snorklies to this private beach in Miami in our tiny speedos and swim all day long like 2 happy octopussies! We love snorkeling for hours and hours seeing all the little sea horsies and little fishies swimming around in the sea! We also seen a sting Ray once! Hehe, it was so scary we both started screaming like 2 little girlies with pink dresses on! Hehe, it was amazing seeing all the beautiful little fishies of the sea and this mask allowed me and Ron Ron to do it! It works great too and is just fabulous!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Make Other People Jealous and Buy this Mask!
customer_reviews.text: I used this mask in Cancun and it performed perfectly. The fit was good and I did not have any trouble breathing. No fogging either when at the surface. My wife is very cautious when it comes to snorkeling due to mouth breathing- this product makes her less apprehensive and anxious. The camera mount works ok. Sometime it would capture more above the water than below. I will use a hand held gimble next time to get better shots. Works perfectly for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stevko

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mask! I bought it to go lobster diving in the keys and it exceeded my expectations. it is quite comfortable even when you wear it most of the day. it was easy to attach my goPro and was not heavy. the detachable camera mount is great! I have a beard but even so there were no leaks. Is seals very tightly. I had a full face mask before but this mask is far superior. I would definitely recommend this mask without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Welch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 15 year old to use at the beach. It was an impulse buy and he picked it out and I just ordered it. So glad we did, he loves this mask. It seals easily, he wore it for several hours, works perfectly to dive with and is simply awesome!!! I am not a huge fan of traditional snorkels but I tried this, so simple to use, easy to learn to use and I know I could spend lots of time snorkeling in our beautiful beach waters now.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Jewell

customer_reviews.title: it leaks
customer_reviews.text: The mask leaked around the eyes. No amount of tightening created a suction around our eye area. ( temples) It is too wide around the eyes. I could put my fingers between my face and the seal. we bought 3 (2 different brands) of them and it did the same for my husband and adult daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Parker

customer_reviews.title: Could not breathe
customer_reviews.text: Went on vacation, could not snorkel. Air does not circulate and cannot keep mask on for more than a minute. We have a different brand and it works fine, this one was completely defective.
customer_reviews.author: David Kordell

customer_reviews.title: So many great features
customer_reviews.text: The dry top system is really nice, especially nice if you dive. You can't pinch your equalize ears if you go very deep but there are other ways. The panoramic view is great. With the internal partition and breathing system, there's no fogging. Have no leaking problems. The camera mount is nice and easy. I've provided a photo of mine mounted.
customer_reviews.author: Pony Express

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask and Snorkel
customer_reviews.text: Like any mask and snorkel, this requires some adjustment, although I would say it's easier to adjust and more comfortable that a typical entry-level mask and snorkel because you don't have to adjust the snorkel position on the mask. When water comes in the snorkel, the whole tube gets automatically cut off, which was a little weird at first, because with most snorkels you get a little salt water then blow to purge. You still blow to purge, but the initial reaction is #^$! can't breath! So test it out before just jumping in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Leftovers

customer_reviews.title: Great full-face snorkel!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased two of these snorkel masks to use on our trip to Jamaica. We had been told how great they are, and with my husband's claustrophobia we felt it would be worth trying. They were right! These masks were perfect and he never once felt like he was going to have a panic attack. They didn't fog up, and if you accidentally go under too far somehow they shut off so you dont end up with a mouth full of sea water! Amazing, and we look forward to snorkeling again and again with these!
customer_reviews.author: K. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask.
customer_reviews.text: I love these mask. Bought this one for my son and he likes this better than the regular mask. Only suggestion is make sure you measure your face and use the guide to selecting your size. I love the field of sight that this offers. The other great thing is when you dive down the snorkel seals off and doesn’t let water in when you come back. I don’t have to clear it like with other brands. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: No leaks, easy breathing, super clear view!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first trial of a full face snorkel mask -- with lots of experience with the more traditional designs. So far I have only tested it in the pool, but I'm impressed! the view space is amazing, super clear, and no fogging issues. Most importantly, there were no leaks at all while being comfortably snug (vs. uncomfortably tight to avoid leaks). Also, just as designed, the moment the snorkel goes under water it will not let in any water -- this is great in open water with waves on the surface that love to dump into a snorkel. Two thumbs up after this pool trial! I'll add to the review after our upcoming Catalina snorkel trip.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan James Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great seal, great quality mask
customer_reviews.text: Take the review with a grain of salt because unfortunately, I have yet to actually use it in the water. That being said, the quality of the mask seems exceptional. The seal it creates, even with my beard, seems great. Blocking the intake, the mask suctions to my face upon inhalation, suggesting an adequate seal. Again, haven't actually used it in the water yet, but I am confident this mask will function well.
customer_reviews.author: tbro4033

customer_reviews.title: Great Snorkel Mask
customer_reviews.text: This is my first full faced snorkel mask and I just love it. The suction is wonderful - I have not had any leaks. It is so nice to be able to see better than goggles. I haven't had any problems with water coming into the top when I go under water, it does exactly as described. I love that it folds up easily. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a full face mask. Shipping was fast. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Granny of 3

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: It takes some getting used to but I do t care how silly I look, I was so pumped to try on this mask. I love the way that it buckles in the back. feels very secure. I purchased a size small and tried it on my 9 year old daughter and it was too large... just FYI. Hope this review is helpful! If it was, would you be so kind to mark it as such? Also, if you appreciate this review and enjoy other great deals, I’d love to connect with YOU! Come say hello on FB/IG! Happy shopping, friends! @prettycheapmama
customer_reviews.author: @prettycheapmama

customer_reviews.title: Great snorkel mask for my 9 year old swimmer
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old is a very good swimmer but always wants to wear goggles or a mask. He loves this snorkel mask and has used it both in the pool and in the ocean. We ordered the size Small and it fits him great yet is adjustable enough that I was able to use it as well as an adult man. So I think the range of fits is excellent and still keeps a nice tight seal to the face and doesn't let water in at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kevitz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase - leaked UNCONTROLLABLY- returned
customer_reviews.text: This mask leaked uncontrollably. We bought three of them and every single one of them leaked. We had different sizes, so it wasn’t a problem with buying the wrong size. We returned every single one of them and had to buy other snorkel masks during our trip. We strongly advise you to purchase a different mask if you want to snorkel with out any issues.
customer_reviews.author: CJJTI

customer_reviews.title: Makes me nauseous
customer_reviews.text: We tried this mask several times and each time after 15 min or so we became seriously nauseous/dizzy. I suspect this was caused by inhaling the earlier exhaled air. I never had this problem before with other masks. Also, from time to time the air access was suddenly blocked which made you pull off your mask. On a positive note, we encountered minimal water leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Witz

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: A couple of years ago, I tried a different full-face mask for the first time. Something about the way the plastic was angled made everything look blurry to me, especially in my peripheral vision. It also was fogging up on me and getting water droplets in it the eye area. I bought this mask based on the reviews and it was like night and day. What a wonderful mask! It never fogged, it was easy to use, easy to breathe in, and I had a perfectly clear view the entire time we were snorkeling. I highly recommend this mask!
customer_reviews.author: Jody Belkowski

customer_reviews.title: Much better than your conventional mask and snorkel!
customer_reviews.text: I tend to go snorkeling on vacation a couple times a year. Each time I would see more and more people with these type of snorkels. My son received one; so I tried it and I was hooked. This is the third brand I have tested and by far the most comfortable, easy to use and the seal is of better quality than the others. My favorite part is instead of sticking the snorkel in my mouth I am free to focus on the surroundings and more hygienic as well. You want be disappointed. FYI When putting on the mask have the straps loose and then tighten them once the mask is on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Cutbags

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: As novice snorklers, I purchased 4 of these for a cruise. I did not want to use the yucky ones the tour companies provided and thought the colorful choices available would assist me in keeping up with the kids in the water. These are a new design which I wasn't so sure about but to my surprise, they worked great. Because they come apart, they packed nicely in the luggage. The suction was good, there were no leaks, and no foggy up! The mask was very clear and was so easy to use. I highly recommend these snorkel masks.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my son's birthday
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wanting this type of mask for a while now so I went ahead and splurged for his birthday. It fits great after adjusting to his size. He's 12 and so I purchased a small. I also like that it doesn't fog up all over the mask when he is wearing it. Eventually, we'll get a goPro type camera and try out the mask with that attached. :) I recommend this mask for snorklers and kids that love being in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Magee

customer_reviews.title: My son is very happy with this snorkel mask
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year-old is very happy with this snorkel mask. The solid, tight fit is a plus as the other one he had would often come off due to waves. He has lost several snorkels as well for the same reason, and he no longer has to worry about that since the snorkel here is attached to the mask. He said the mask is comfortable to wear and he is always bringing it when we go to the beach. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anders O. Halvorsen

customer_reviews.title: Best Full Face Snorkel I've Used!
customer_reviews.text: I've used other full face snorkels and they leaked.....This snorkel fits perfectly with no leak around my face whatsoever and it is a joy to use! I wish I was swimming now but Covid-19 has shut down the gym pull and our neighborhood pool. I'm going to definitely order more for the family! The straps are very comfortable for snorkeling a long time. I am 6'1" 290lbs and it fits my face great and gets a good seal.
customer_reviews.author: Justin From Overkill Everything

customer_reviews.title: Works as should! Great if you struggle with a normal snorkel set
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our vacation to the Virgin Island and loved them. It was easy to use and loved the wide viewing mask. I have a hard time with a typical snorkel set - so this was perfect - hands and mouth free! Definitely recommend. If you can, try it at home ahead of time so you get a feel for how the breathing is. My husband panicked a little at first because it is slightly different than just breathing air. Take your time, stay calm and just breath and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: DeejTeeg

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer in the snorkel world. I can’t say enough great things about this product. I recently got to test it out for the first time in Jamaica. No more mouth pieces. And no more excursions where you have to share mouth pieces. You just put the mask on and breathe normally out of your nose or mouth. The mask gives you a much better view as it’s doesn’t block your peripheral vision. My advice would be to buy some anti fog spray with it. I had 0% fog the entire trip.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Inhaled and exhaled air are not kept separate
customer_reviews.text: The design keeping separation of inhaled and exhaled air would be ok except there are a few flaws allowing exhaled CO2 to mix with incoming air. Where the snorkel tube connects with the mask there is no seal between incoming and out going air channels allowing the two to mix. In fact, the path of least resistance for exhaled air appears to be through this gap between the supposed separate channels resulting in exhaled air being directed into the incoming air channel where only fresh air should be. This failure is not in the mask itself but between the connecting point of the snorkel tube and mask.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a negative
customer_reviews.text: We just returned from 6 day of snorkeling in the Virgin Islands so I had a concentrated time to make an assessment. The product lives up to its expectations in most ways. I found the mask had much more breathing resistance than the traditional snorkel tube. I used my wives traditional two piece mask/snorkel and breathing was SO much more free. At the end of 6 days, my lungs noticeably hurt from inhaling with resistance. Other than that negative there is nothing to dislke about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Burger

customer_reviews.title: Easy breathing, tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I love snorkeling but have always found the traditional mouth snorkel difficult to use. Every time I‘d go out, I’d swallow too much water...but I did not have a problem with this once. Super easy to use, super clear viewing and never foggy. Also it is very quiet while breathing...I bring this up because my boyfriend got a different mask (but similar style) and each time you breathe out, it release on the sides of the masks and sounds like you’re Darth Vader under water 😅 While it is tight even after adjustments (it presses down on your sinuses) I did not have ANY leaking for the snorkel trip I did in the Florida Keys.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure if this wasn’t work for me since I have had problems with most every snorkel that I’ve ever used. This mask and brand is amazing. The first time I’ve actually enjoyed snorkeling. I actually stayed out longer than my husband did. When they say that it’s fog proof they really mean fog proof. There is another family on our snorkel trip that had a different brand and as soon as they got into the water there’s fogged up immediately.
customer_reviews.author: ANGIE GREENE

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: I had never gone snorkeling before, and on first use I was able to see and breathe with no issues or problems!! If I dipped my head too low, it would not allow water inside my mask! When my head was too low and I took in a breathe it was sealed and I knew instantly I had my head in wrong position. I would go back to correct head position and could breathe easy again! Super easy to use!! Recommend getting if you need a reliable snorkeling mask!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blebba

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these masks for our family of 4. They are comfortable & easy to put on. We all tried them out in a pool first and found it easy to breath & no water came into the mask when going under the water. Personally, when snorkeling in the ocean I found it a more difficult to get enough air. My family did not have an issue. My only disappointment was that a piece of the plastic snorkel broke when we were putting the snorkel down after the first use. :/
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9-year old son. He’d been begging for one for a while and even though me and my husband thought it was ridiculous, we let him purchase it with his own money. Surprisingly, my kiddo really likes it. He’s probably used it about 10 times total and still goes back to it. We haven’t done any sea snorkeling but he uses it a lot in the pool and his friends think he is big and bad :)
customer_reviews.author: D. Murph

customer_reviews.title: Just keep swimming
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to setup, and the water and sand proof bag is a great addition. I didn’t use the GoPro mount but it will come in handy when we travel to beach resorts every year. Didn’t fog up, was easy to breathe as long as you don’t go under water. It completely locks up the air when fully submerged.
customer_reviews.author: Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mask
customer_reviews.text: I got this mask for my 12 year old son who is a swimmer. I have gone through several snorkel masks that didn't seal well or fit correctly so I decided to give this one a try. It fits perfectly and is very comfortable. My son says he doesn't even feel it on his face. It is very natural feeling. The suction is great and it just perfect for the lake. I highly recommend this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bannon

customer_reviews.title: Great mask #LiveLiveSnorkel
customer_reviews.text: This is the first mask my 14 year old has had and I got it for the cruise in the Bahamas. I chose a full face one to give her more visibility when snorkeling for the first time. I personally like the full face or one piece best. We tested the seal and it’s great. I pulled on a few parts and it seems sturdy and well made. I loved the color choices. I’m going to order a couple more in different colors so we can quickly tell them apart. #LiveLiveSnorkel
customer_reviews.author: : : L J Hall : :

customer_reviews.title: View great! Comfort ok. Not for diving down in. CO2 will build up
customer_reviews.text: So bought two. One leaks one doesn’t. They do provide great view if not leaking. Holds go pro perfectly. They do suction really tight making them slightly uncomfortable after long use but not too bad. They are not designed for diving down in, only for viewing on top. Too much carbon dioxide will build up with too much exertion. Not safe for that. But view is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Trish

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Snorkel Mask
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these snorkel masks for myself, and a smaller sized one for my son. I was surprised at how well the masks work. The view underwater was absolutly clear. As described, the mask doesn't fog up during use. If you go underwater, the mask seals up (you feel the mask suction if you try to breath underwater). Mask sort of folds down (the snorkel part detaches) and they provide a mesh bag for carry & storage. It's not a glamorous bag, but it's really nice touch to include a such functional/usable bag. Overall, a well thought out product, that works exactly how you would hope it would, and packaged in a convenient way.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: What a nice surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to buy a couple of snorkels because my girlfriend and I were going to be spending a few days at Catalina Island. I saw these on Amazon with all the positive ratings and thought what the heck, I'll give them a try. We were really impressed with how well they worked and how easy it was to breath. You can breath through your mouth and nose, and there are no leaks whatsoever. Definitely made for a fun snorkeling experience!
customer_reviews.author: Surfpipe

customer_reviews.title: Mask is big, but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got this mask for my 11 year old and it fits great. I expected the s/m size to be too small for me to wear but it fits me great too. The straps are fully adjustable and the mask fits very snug. Quality of the plastic is very high end, does not feel cheap. It is a little heavy but the plastic is thick so that is what you want. Worth the price, very fun to use. Pro's S/m is very big Comfortable to wear Straps are fully adjustable Works as desired Plastic is thick Con's A little heavy
customer_reviews.author: Peter Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great snorkel mask
customer_reviews.text: Great snorkel mask that doesn't leak, fog up or restrict air flow. This is the first snorkel mask I've purchased as I wanted to learn to snorkel but didn't like the traditional snorkel with its unnatural breathing set up. This one works great and very comfortable to use. I would recommend using it in shallow water to get used to it and check for fit before venturing into deeper water.
customer_reviews.author: RIta

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  This is the greatest mask and snorkel ever!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for a recent trip to the Turks and Caicos and was a bit skeptical at first that they would work as well as some of the reviews had indicated. Turned out they worked better than I could have imagined. We were able to snorkel for 30 or more minutes, heads going in and out of the water, without once having to take the mask off. They are super comfortable and there's no jaw ache from having to bite down on a conventional snorkel. This mask is very resistant to leaks. I'd give this product 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Cayl

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old leaky mask. This one is definitely an upgrade, no leaking! The clear viewing window doesn't fog up and seems clearer than my last mask. It did make some funny whistling noise when you breath. My husband bought a slightly different version and his did too. I found that if I slow my breathing, and don't breath is so hard that the sound goes away.
customer_reviews.author: angie kunze

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! Great for our snorkeling trips
customer_reviews.text: We took these down to Cancun and we were glad we had our own snorkels for each excursion. Many of the others in our group used the snorkels from the tour boats and ran into all sorts of problems, fitting, leaking etc. I had a similar unit from another company and why we kept these units were because the snorkel on top was extra tall so we could get further below the water. One bonus about these compared to traditional snorkels is that having your mouth free allows you to talk with each other as your swim around the surface!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Less water than old fashioned mask & snorkel
customer_reviews.text: Fits well to the face, preventing water from getting in (so long as you move all hair out of the way). Easier to breathe in than a traditional snorkel. Love that you can breathe out of your nose. The flat front is preferred to other models which have curved fronts - the curve distorts the view. This one doesn't have that problem - I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for a full face mask
customer_reviews.text: As we all know, the different types of masks are better for different types of snorkeling. This mask is fantastic if the full face is the right type for the activity. I personally prefer a normal mask when diving down, and this mask when remaining at the top of the water line. The water prevention is fantastic and will absolutely not allow you to inhale water, and I tested it quite thorougly.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: You can breathe out of your nose!!!
customer_reviews.text: In the past, I've had some bad experiences with snorkeling! I am a nose breather and its very difficult to breathe through my mouth sometimes...So when I purchased this Snorkel mask I was so relieved when I first got to use it! I could breathe through my nose and not freak out! Also a major major selling point... If the top of the snorkel goes underwater a float valve goes up and no water will come into your mask! OMG!!! It's fabulous! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Great value, NO leaks
customer_reviews.text: I love nearly everything about this snorkel mask. I’ve never used one before but we recently went on a trip to the Bahamas and could snorkel right in our front yard in a lagoon. At first it took some getting used to but I loved it. I could breathe fairly easily and it leak or fog up at all. I highly recommend it. The only thing I didn’t like was sometimes when I was breathing, it made a honking noise. I don’t know how else to describe it and I could usually adjust it so it wouldn’t do that. Nonetheless, it was somewhat annoying. Overall, I think for the price, you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: bee

customer_reviews.title: Really nice full face mask
customer_reviews.text: Really nice mask. I took it to my trip do Jamaica. I was amazed of how well it performed for me. The field of view is much better than regular snorkel mask. Breathing is easy due to separate tubes for exhale and inhale, because of this mask also didn’t get foggy. Go pro mount is a nice plus as I was able to just mount my go pro and enjoy snorkeling while filming underwater Life. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Iurii Skrypets

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'd say this product meets its description. First time users of snorkels like myself may have to get use to breathing in them. And in high waves it does a great job of preventing water getting it (people will have to get use to air being blocked when waves get over your air source in the middle of your breathing suddenly). I think my only gripes are that it fogs up after a few hours of use (not completely but you won't be able to see the sides). And sand, shells and rocks may get between the rubber and the screen of your goggles which is hard to get out. Other than that, a very good goggle.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Traveling Snorkeling Mask
customer_reviews.text: So nice to finally have a snorkeling mask that is so easy to use and see through. The design allows you to just snorkel and not spend every breath worrying about how to breathe. We really like how they quickly fold down to pack for traveling and are a snap to get set up to get in the water fast. More comfortable than our old style masks by far. We bought two.
customer_reviews.author: wmaursta

customer_reviews.title: Really great!!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how great this mask is. The glass is crystal clear while breathing, the suction is great and there are no leaks. There is even a little thing that plugs when you dive under so no water gets into the tube! One fair warning though, having a beard WILL prevent the seal from closing all the way and it will cause water to get in. Not an issue with the product, just something that happens
customer_reviews.author: Jett Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Best snorkeling mask
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, great quality, fits perfectly without any gaps or leakage. I bought 2 sets, for me and my husband for our Hawaii trip and we both loved it. We are new to snorkeling and were not sure if we should go for conventional snorkel mask or this full face mask, but based on other people's reviews and product description, we were convinced that this is the one we need, and we didn't regret our decision. It is very convenient to wear and makes it easy to use for a long duration for newbies like us. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy to use! I guess there are 2 ways to mount a Go Pro
customer_reviews.text: The official way to mount the Go Pro is down by the lens, but it looks like you could mount it up at the top of the snorkel as well, if you wanted to. It's a great product, easy to use, and a good price. Well worth it. The Go Pro mount is very secure and no worries about the Go Pro coming off. If you like fish, you should buy this snorkel
customer_reviews.author: JBoi
